message: Bob, I think a 60/40 split is fair to start. What do you think?
Alice, your offer was a bit cheeky! How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  This round is my turn to propose after all.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll come down a bit, but 55/45 is too much. How about 58/42?
Alice, time is running out!  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 4800. It's a better deal than you'll get if you keep rejecting!
